abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said it planned to sell the securities in pieces rather than a big chunk, giving investors opportunities to bid on the assets.
snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said it planned to sell the securities in pieces rather than a big chunk, giving investors opportunities to bid on the assets.

headline.main: New York Fed Rejects A.I.G. Bid to Buy Mortgage Assets

keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
